tabs.addressBar-placeholder: Type a search query or a URL

security.message-internal: This is an internal Monolith page
security.message-local: This is a local or a shared file
security.description-secure:
The information you provide (such as passwords or credit cards) will be securely sent to this site and cannot be intercepted.
Always be sure you're on the intended site before entering any information.
security.description-insecure: It is recommended you do not send information such as passwords or credit cards to this site, because it can be intercepted.

local: An unknown local error has occured
Something went wrong on this device, for example the browser ran out of memory or a firewall blocked the request
connection: An unknown connection error has occured
Something went wrong while connecting to the server, for example the connection was refused or you have connected to another network
certificate: We can't trust the certificate of the host ${host}.
http: An unknown HTTP error has occured
This could mean that the URL (${url}) is invalid or the server sent an incorrect response. Check the spelling of the URL and try again.
cache: The cache seems to be corrupted
This could mean that your OS has rejected a cache operation or the cache was corrupted.
unknown: That's all we know. Well, we also know this error code:

noSiteAccess: We can't get access to this site.

Here's what you can do:
  • Check if there are any typos in the host name "${host}".
  • Run network diagnostics
  • Change DNS over HTTPS settings
noFileAccess: We can't get access to this file.
Perhaps, file at '${path}' was moved or deleted
fileTooBig: That thing is massive! Do you think I can handle opening it?
denied: Permission to access a file or a shared resource was denied.
virus: This file is infected with a virus
The file at '${path}' is infected. It is recommended that you delete it.
netChange: Perhaps, you connected to another Wi-Fi or Ethernet network.
blockedByResponse: This page refused to be displayed like that.
The server sent a response that prevents this page from being displayed, for example, in a frame on another page.
blockedbyCSP: The request was blocked by Content Security Policy.

saving.error-alreadyExists: Файл с таким именем уже существует.
